field.name: ViesValid
field.label: Intra-Community Valid
field.help: European VAT numbers are automatically checked on the VIES database.

field.name: PerformViesValidation
field.help: Technical field used to determine whether VIES validation is relevant for selecting a fiscal position on this partner

field.name: ViesVatToCheck
field.help: Technical field used to determine the VAT to check
